p: 3-(4,5-Dimethylthiazol-2yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide (MTT), tetramethylrhodamine ethyl ester (TMRE), sulphorhodamine B (SRB), trichloroacetic acid (TCA), Tris base (tris [hydroxymethyl]aminomethane), calcin AM, annexin V and propidium iodide (PI) were obtained from Sigma Aldrich Chemie GmbH (Taufkirchen, Germany). Dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) was procured from Carl Roth GmbH & Co. (Karlsruhe, Germany). Roswell Park Memorial Institute (RPMI) 1640 Medium, Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s minimum essential medium (DMEM), Fetal bovine serum (FBS) were purchased from Capricon Scientific (Ebsdorfergrund, Germany). The Caspase-Glo 3/7 Assay kit was procured from Promega (Walldorf, Germany), and carbonyl cyaninde 4-(trifluoromethoxy) phenylhydrazone (FCCP) was from Cayman Chemical (Ann Arbor, Michigan, USA).
